page.title: 13OUR HOBBIES-5
page.content: My hobby is horse riding.I like tacking horses up. That means putting the bridlle on and putting the sadlle on and grooming them. I hate getting on.Some times the stirrups are too long or too small or the sadlle is on wrong. Sometimes it is hard to put on the bridlle.You can not ride Raindrop because she is having a baby. You can ride Shannon but she is a bit frisky. SARAH RICHARDS. My hobby is also horse riding.I go nearly every night when I get home from school.I have my own horse.It is called Charline. She is black and has blue eyes. I go in the field and I jump,walk,trot,and gallop. Sometimes I go up the road. I take her for a walk. I feed her on hay and corn in the winter.I in the summer I put her out to the field. Then she eats the grass. She is 13.2. hands high.BRIDGET DOIDGE
